data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yakovlev, Roman V., Pljustch, Igor G., Skrylnik, Yuriy, Pak, Oleg, Witt, Thomas J. (2015): The Cossidae (Lepidoptera) of Afghanistan with description of three new species and special notes on the fauna of Bande-Amir National Park. Zootaxa 3990 (1): 41-72, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3990.1.3
